div.ab1: pas varas z-inke az gāv va varazā mičinand dast rā b-āb-e pādyāvi pāk bešuyad va ān varas rā be-dast girad se bār b-āb-e pādyāvi bešuyad
Afterwards, they cut the varas from a cow or beef. He washes the hand clean with pādyāb and takes the varas with the hand and wash it three times with pādyāb.

aṣ̌əm vōhū čahār guftan ke se ašem vohū az bon ō sar šostan va pas se bār ḥalqe begardānand pas yek ḥalqe-ye zarrin b-āb pādyāvi bešuyand va ān varas ḥalqe-karde dar gardan-e ān andazand va ān ḥalqe-ye zarrin rā be-sar-e barsom-čin konand va yek sukure porr az āb-e pādyāb konand va yek-pāre-ye var-e ātaš vaharām dar ānǧā konand yaʾni xākestar-e ātaš šeib-e-ān nahānd čenānke ḫorm-e ātaš bālā na-yāyad va ān āb be-ǧuš āyad va panǧāh-o yek bār ān varas b-āb ǧušān foru barand va bar āvarand zud āb-e sard b-ānǧā foru rizand

He has to recite four Aṣ̌əm Vohū. During the third, he has to wash (the varas) from the begin to the end. They braid it three times and wash a golden ring with pādyāb. Then they put the braided varas in the the ring neck and pit the golden ring next to the barsom-čin. They fill a sukure with pādyāb and put some hot ashes of the Ātaš Waharām in it (viz. the sukure), that is, they put ashes of the fire at its bottom so that the smoke of the fire does not go up and the water reaches the boiling point. The bring the varas fifty one times to the boiling water and take it out. Immediatly, the pour cold water on it.
digar ān varas az ḥalqe bāz konand se bār b-āb-e pādyāvi bešuyand
Then they lose again the varas from the ring and wash it three times with pādyāb.
čahār aṣ̌əm vōhū čon piš neveštam pas digar be-ḥalqe dar-ārand dar hamān ḥalqe-ye zarrin andazand va hezār-o-yek bār b-āb-e pādyāvi foru barand va bar-āvarand va varasdān nahand

four Aṣ̌əm Vohū as I have written before. Then they wind the varas in the ring and put it in the same golden ring. They bring it thousand and one times to the water and out of it and lay the varas-dān.
sar-aš mohkam be-nahand va dar yazišngāh mohkam be-nahand
Then they lose again the varas from the ring and wash it three times with pādyāb.
